attributes.action: LAW NEEDS CHANGING ON FOOTBALLS KICKED INTO GARDENS OF HOUSES.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WHO ARE HAVING PLANTS AND FLOWERS SNAPPED OFF BY CHILDREN 10 AND OVER IN OUR GARDENS SHOULD NOT HAVE THE LAW ON THERE SIDE, IF IT IS PERSISTANT AS IT IS MOST OF THE TIME THE LAW SHOULD BE THAT THEY LOOSE THE BALL, THEY ARE CAUSING `CRIMINAL DAMAGE` TO A PROPERTIES AND THAT PROPERTIES  `PRIDE AND JOY` AS PLANTS COST MONEY TO REPLACE, AT THIS TIME BALLS HAVE TO BE GIVEN BACK OR ITS CLASSED AS THEFT FOR THEM TO DO THE SAME AGAIN AND AGAIN, LACKING PARENT CONTROL, THE LAW NEEDS AMENDING TO PROTECT PEOPLES PROPERTY, AS BALLS CAN AND DO DENT CAR ROOFS ECT WITH DAMAGE TO THE PAINT WORK AS THE BALL IS OFTEN COVERED IN GRIT, SMASH GARDEN LIGHTS, SMASH GREENHOUSES. IT IS AN OFFENCE TO KICK BALLS IN THE ROAD, THE SAME SHOULD BE IN GARDENS AS THERE ARE PLAY AREAS AND PARKS FOR THIS. COMMON SENSE IN LAW.
